item.title: Fareeha add a quote by Elizabeth Peters
item.description: "No woman really wants a man to carry her off; she only wants him to want to do it." -- Elizabeth Peters

item.title: Fareeha add a quote by Agatha Christie
item.description: "It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them. " -- Agatha Christie

item.title: Fareeha add a quote by Agatha Christie
item.description:
"A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity. It dares all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
<i>-The Last Seance (from The Hound of Death and Other Stories, also Double Sin and Other Stories)</i>" -- Agatha Christie

item.title: Fareeha add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Fareeha add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Fareeha add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Fareeha add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Fareeha add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Fareeha add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain
